projects.title: Skyglow Estimation Toolbox
projects.desc: Measuring regional light pollution using NASA satellite data. Used to help monitor and protect national parks and wildlife.

projects.title: Asteroid 2000 JQ66
projects.cap: Determining the Orbit of a Near-Earth Asteroid
projects.desc: Program written in Python to calculate and visualize the orbit of a near-Earth asteroid using original observations. Part of Summer Science Program (SSP) '16.

talks.title: Arcadia High Graduation Speech
talks.desc: Given at the 2017 Arcadia High School Graduation Ceremony at Santa Anita Park. Time flies.

talks.title: Lord of the Flies
talks.desc: Covers the loss of inhibition in society, in Youtube comments, and on the playground. Given at the 2013 NSDA Middle School National Finals. Coached by Scott Wheeler.

talks.title: Smart Guys Finish Last
talks.desc: An original oratory from middle school about society's aversion to intellectualism. Endless thanks to my speech & debate coach, Scott Wheeler.
